name: FF Tabs Tree - enhance appearance
description:
for Tree Style Tabs and probably others, tries to be as compatible as possible,
should also work with coloring tabs (I'm currently using FabTabs).

Please use
  in Tree Style Tabs  skin: Plain or Vertigo, twisties: Retro

needs style 17664, recommended style 5363 and style 9776

proved on Firefox 46, 47
additional_info:
